name: The Vegas Gambler
overview: The Vegas Gambler is a slot machine game for the VIC-20. Each play on the slot machine costs 1 coin, and the player starts with 25 coins. There are multiple ways to win, but only the central row can provide winners. If the player wins 1 coin, they can choose to collect or gamble a higher win, but risk losing everything. At internals, the player gets a second spin, and can chose to hold 1 or 2 of the columns. Game is over if the player loses all coins or breaks the bank. Released in the July\August 1984 VICTAPE Computing Issue #5.
